user_query: I want to surprise my partner with a romantic date night. Can you suggest some unique date ideas and provide me with some romantic quotes for a handwritten note? Additionally, find a fancy restaurant with a private dining area and a live music performance. Also, check the availability of tickets for a romantic theater play on the same evening.

TaskList.description: Provide romantic quotes for a handwritten note.
Find a fancy restaurant with a private dining area and live music.
Check the availability of tickets for a romantic theater play on the same evening.
